CHAT.comment: Originally subject 100 , changed to 97 for easy numbering
Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT CHI and INV enter the room . MOT is holding the CHI
INV explains warm-up procedure to MOT . MOT faces camera while holding CHI
CHI looks down at toys in front of her and at INV
INV leaves the room
